content: {"name": "True Holy Church", "alternate_name": "", "description": "- The food received is based on family size so to receive foood enough to accomodate all family members please carry any documentations from school report cards, ids or even birth certificates.\n", "email": "", "url": "https://www.trueholychurch.org/?fbclid=IwAR3g-JLKT1fWzgBaWyQ66S8FEokFohf7B9EzyWew0j3EgCusmRe9-IboS50", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "2364 Atlantic Avenue", "address_2": "", "city": "Ocean Hill", "state_province": "NY", "postal_code": "11233", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.6759251, "longitude": -73.9067549}, "phones": [{"number": "(646) 773-2192", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Saturday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Diapers upon availability"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Client can visit: Once a week "}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clothing may be available"}]}
